How often do you use your mobile banking: I use my mobile banking app almost every day to check my account balance, pay bills, and transfer funds between accounts. It's convenient and saves me time.

What features do you wish your current b: I wish my current banking app had a budget tracking feature that would help me manage my expenses. It would also be nice if it had an option for mobile check deposit, so I wouldn't have to go to the bank to deposit a check.

What are your financial goals in the sho: My short-term financial goals are to save money for emergencies and pay off my credit card balance. I also want to make sure I don't overspend on non-essential items and stick to my budget.

What are your financial goals in the lon: In the long-term, my financial goals are to pay off my student loans, save for a down payment on a house, and invest in my retirement. I also want to have enough savings to travel and start a family someday.
